Name: rngsubtype
Description: OID of the element type (subtype) of this range\n type

Name: rngcollation
Description: OID of the collation used for range comparisons, or 0\n if none

Name: rngsubopc
Description: OID of the subtype's operator class used for range\n comparisons

Name: rngcanonical
Description: OID of the function to convert a range value into\n canonical form, or 0 if none

Name: rngsubdiff
Description: OID of the function to return the difference between\n two element values as double precision, or 0 if none
